title: Bug 37858Some SWT Labels draw text in white
description: Bug 37858Some SWT Labels draw text in white
OB: I20030516 (or SWT HEAD)MacOS 10.2.6 start Eclipse on new workspace open New wizard select Java / New Project press NextObserve: two labels on wizard page are not readable since they draw the text in white.
